https://tmrev.io/movie/84706-Colour Blossoms 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nrGCLoiS5yvPx6hWkvFO1woOLGI.jpg A real estate agent is drawn into a torrid - and sadomasochistic - relationship with a morose, stunningly beautiful Japanese photographer. The two cavort in a luxurious apartment owned by an elegant upper-crust Japanese lady, crossing paths with an infatuated policeman, a mysterious Korean woman, and an increasingly tangled web of violence, criss-crossing passions, and lurid, unchecked desires. Colour Blossoms
